titleStmt.title: By the Lord Lieutenant and Councell upon consideration of the annexed instrument, whereby it is concluded and accorded that there be a further continuation of the cessation of armes ... untill the fifteenth day of August, 1645 ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1641-1649 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first lines of text.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin, XXIX. Iuly, 1645."
Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
